name: Kirby Platformer
description:
You are now in Dreamland, you get to play as kirby, your objective is simple: Reach the door before the time's up.

Be aware, you might encounter enemies on your route, so keep your guards up. 

Remember, as kirby, your ability is to inhale enemies and steal their powers, so make sure you use that as your advantage! 

Every enemy you kill is more experience therefore bonus time for you.

To open the door you need a key of course. The other kirbys failed to access it, will you be the one who saves the day? Let's find out!

Mechanics:

You move with A and D.

Jump with Space and fly with space when you are in the air.

While flying press left click to spit, spitting allows you to damage enemies hit and stop flying. Be careful though, there is a small delay until you can fly again.

Shield with W.

Inhale with Left Click. you are unable to move while doing so.

If you transform into fire, you may now shoot fire with left click instead (You are unable to move while shooting), and dash forward with right click. 

To go back to default kirby, you may Press X.

Tips:

You can inhale certain objects, and spit them on the enemies to damage them.

if You stand close enough to the objects, you can move them without Inhaling them, which in certain Scenarios might be helpful.

And lastly, don't forget the "Cherry on top". Make sure you take it only when you mostly need it.
